title: Web Developer, Glide Tech
description: As a part of content engineering team, I have specialized in deploying content models and utilizing CMS technology, a role that also encompassed significant front-end development. This engagement providedme with invaluable experience in client communication, involving both needs analysis prior to the initial release and ongoing maintenance after product launch.

title: Junior Software Developer Internship, Cape Ann Enterprises
description: During my tenure at Cape Ann, spanning over a year, I was afforded a unique opportunity to immerse myself in the dynamic world of full-stack development. This experience offering me a 8rsthand taste of collaborative teamwork and project life-cycle management.

title: Bachelor of Information Technology, IPI Academy
description: While at IPI Academy, I got deep into various facets of IT, discovering a profound passion for subjects that truly resonated with me. The immersive curriculum exposed me to an array of captivating topics, including operating systems, data structures, and object-oriented programming. These subjects, in particular, ignited my curiosity and drove me to explore their intricacies with fervor.

title: Bild IT
description: Stepping into the world of programming, I have dedicated a year to continuous learning and improvement, ultimately achieving success in procedural and object-oriented exam. This milestone solidified my foundational understanding of full-stack development.
